item.title: CVE-2012-1592|2024-08-06T19:01:02.750Z -- libstruts1.2-java -- libstruts1.2-java
item.description: A local code execution issue exists in Apache Struts2 when processing malformed XSLT files, which could let a malicious user upload and execute arbitrary files.
